allow: Bash(powershell -Command "try { Get-Process -Name node | Where-Object { (New-Object System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient -ArgumentList ''127.0.0.1'', 3000).Connected } | Stop-Process -Force } catch {}; try { Get-Process -Name node | Where-Object { (New-Object System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient -ArgumentList ''127.0.0.1'', 3001).Connected } | Stop-Process -Force } catch {}")
